PerformanceGetEntriesByType.summary: The getEntriesByType() method returns an array of objects currently present in the performance timeline for a given type.

remarks.para: If you are interested in performance entries of certain name, see . For all performance entries, see .

blockquote.para:
Note: This method does not notify you about new performance entries; you will only get entries that are present in the performance timeline at the time you call this method.
To receive notifications about entries as they become available, use a .

remarks.para: The following entry types are not supported by this method at all and won't be returned even if entries for these types might exist:
To access entries of these types, you must use a instead.

PerformanceGetEntriesByType.returns: An {{jsxref("Array")}} of objects that have the specified type. The items will be in chronological order based on the entries' . If no objects have the specified type, or no argument is provided, an empty array is returned.
